/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars of various colors are scattered across the street, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
